item.title: Maven
item.description: Maven projects can use the yosql-tooling-maven plugin to use YoSQL in their builds. The following steps show how a basic setup looks like. In case you are looking for more details, check out the configuration section further down below. Add the plugin to your pom.xml: <build> <plugins> ... <plugin> <groupId>wtf.metio.yosql</groupId> <artifactId>yosql-tooling-maven</artifactId> <version>2023.2.22</version> </plugin> ... </plugins> </build> Add .sql files in src/main/yosql and write SQL statements into them. Take a look at the various options to structure your SQL files.
